slider.name: av_position_updown
slider.tool_tip: Move the selected avatar up or down

slider.name: av_position_leftright
slider.tool_tip: Move the selected avatar left or right

slider.name: av_position_inout
slider.tool_tip: Move the selected avatar in or out

button.label: Set Left
button.name: button_loadHandPoseLeft
button.tool_tip: Click to set your left hand to the selected preset

button.label: Set Right
button.name: button_loadHandPoseRight
button.tool_tip: Click to set your right hand to the selected preset

scroll_list.tool_tip: Select the Avatar or Animesh you want to animate.
scroll_list.name: avatarSelection_scroll

button.name: refresh_avatars
button.tool_tip: Refresh the list of avatars and animeshes

button.label: Start Posing
button.tool_tip: Start posing the selected avatar or animesh, if you are allowed to
button.name: start_stop_posing_button

button.label: Set to T-Pose
button.name: set_t_pose_button
button.tool_tip: Click to set the selected avatar to a 'T-Pose'

slider.name: trackpad_sensitivity_slider
slider.tool_tip: Adjusts the sensitivity of the trackball

check_box.name: natural_direction_checkbox
check_box.label: Use natural alignment
check_box.tool_tip: The skeleton has unnatural joint rotations by default. This complicates posing. When checked, the joints will rotate in a more natural way.

check_box.name: stop_posing_on_close_checkbox
check_box.label: Stop posing when closed
check_box.tool_tip: Not stopping your pose can be helpful if you do a lot of work, and don't want to accidentally lose it.

check_box.name: reset_base_rotation_on_edit_checkbox
check_box.label: Reset base-rotation on edit
check_box.tool_tip: When you first edit a rotation, reset it to zero. This means your work can save a pose (and not a diff see load/save). A green tick appears next each joint you have zero-ed export.

check_box.name: also_save_bvh_checkbox
check_box.label: Write BVH when saving**
check_box.tool_tip: When you save your pose, also write a BVH file, which can be uploaded via the 'Build > Upload > Animation' to pose yourself or others in-world. This needs joints to reset their 'base' to zero, because BVH requires original work.

check_box.name: confirm_overwrite_on_save_checkbox
check_box.label: Confirm Overwrite
check_box.tool_tip: When you save a pose, if the file already exists, you need to click the save button again to confirm you are sure you want to overwrite.

button.name: toggleVisualManipulators
button.tool_tip: Toggle the visual manipulators on and off

fs_virtual_trackpad.name: limb_rotation
fs_virtual_trackpad.tool_tip: Change the rotation of the currently selected body part(s). Hold Ctrl to move slow. Roll the wheel to adjust the 3rd axis. Use Shift or Alt to swap which rotations change

button.name: undo_change
button.tool_tip: Undo the last change

button.name: button_redo_change
button.tool_tip: Re-do the last change

button.name: poser_joint_reset
button.tool_tip: Click to reset the selected body part(s) to when you first started posing

button.name: delta_mode_toggle
button.tool_tip: If changing multiple joints, each changes by the same amount instead of getting the same change. Also used for breaking Gimbal Lock.

button.label: Mirror
button.name: button_toggleMirrorRotation
button.tool_tip: Mirror changes to the opposite joint.

button.label: Copy
button.name: button_toggleSympatheticRotation
button.tool_tip: Copy changes to the opposite joint.

button.label: Copy L > R
button.name: button_symmetrize_left_to_right
button.tool_tip: Click to copy change from left side to right side.

button.label: Copy R > L
button.name: button_symmetrize_right_to_left
button.tool_tip: Click to copy change from right side to left side.

scroll_list.tool_tip: Load a pose for who you are animating.
scroll_list.name: poses_scroll

button.name: FlipPose_avatar
button.tool_tip: Flip the whole pose left/right

button.name: FlipJoint_avatar
button.tool_tip: Mirror the selected body part(s) left/right

button.label: Recap
button.name: button_RecaptureParts
button.tool_tip: If the selected body part(s) is/are OFF, this Recaptures what those body parts are doing right now.

button.label: Part(s) On/Off
button.name: toggle_PosingSelectedBones
button.tool_tip: Turn the Poser on or off for the selected body part(s). When off, that body part animates like normal (with your AO or a pose-ball/etc.)

button.label: Own Poses
button.name: toggleLoadSavePanel
button.tool_tip: Load, save and manage the poses you make
Manage your pose directory
button.name: open_poseDir_button

button.label: Save Diff
button.tool_tip: A Diff is just your changes to an existing Pose. Start from a T-Pose to save a new work.
button.name: save_poses_button
